comment: professor was good until the last week.had an A+ average-in a day my average went to C. She was unwilling in the end to communicate and put in final grades a wk early without a word.  I spent hours and hours and hours on every assignment and the workload was super heavy.class was hard and I worked hard. I deserved better.and explanation at least

Professor Frazier is the sweetest, she will help you succeed in any way possible! The course itself is very heavy with assignments but the professor breaks it down into a manner that is very manageable and fun at the same time. I an not a tech savy person as well but I learned soo much in this course, I definitely recommend taking her class.

Is this class a lot? Yes. But is it manageable with Dr. Frazier? Absolutely. Each module took me roughly 5 hours to complete. Getting yourself to start on the assignments will be the hardest part. Once you get going, the work itself is enjoyable. Dr. Frazier gives such clear instructions & will meet with you online if you ever need help. Take her!!

Dr. Frazier is the best. I am not a tech savvy person, yet Dr. Frazier explained everything & made it comprehensible for me. She has a very clear grading criteria, including many examples of what she's looking for. Super helpful & accessible. I worked for my grade, but the wealth of knowledge I've gained in the tech category is simply amazing.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Absolutely love Dr. Frazier!! She is so sweet and really wants you to succeed. She provides feedback on your work and allows you to correct for a better grade. Attendance is mandatory as you will receive a participation grade for each class.

I absolutely love Dr. Frazier! She is one of the few professors that I have met that truly cares about her students and wants to see them succeed in their class. She will not just give you the answer, but she will help you get there! Class is a lot of work, but she is always there to help. Take her if you can!

I LOVE THIS PROFESSOR! she is so sweet and really cares about the students. She gives you chances to do better on assignments because she cares about the knowledge you are gaining and not one time score. There was a good bit of work but she is always available for questions!! Overall I love this professor and would take her again in a heartbeat.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: BEST PROFESSOR EVER! I have NEVER had a professor who cares SO much about her students and their success. Yes, this course was A LOT, but it was also due to it being a summer course. There was a lot to do, but it was truly beneficial and fun. She gives AMAZING feedback, and lets you fix your mistakes. Easy A if you put in the work! TAKE HER COURSE!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: Loved taking this professor. She made it easy to sit through the 2 hour classes. I actually learned so many fun technology skills from her. I loved the materials that we learned and the modules were so fun to watch. I really enjoyed this class so very much!
She is a very nice professor and the class isn’t that hard. However, the workload outside of class is awful omg. We sit in the class 3 hours then have 5 hours of homework every week. It’s too much.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Frazier is a really good professor and she works with you on every assignment. She gives good feedback and allows you to resubmit things after you revise them. My only complaint with this class is that we do more work outside of the classroom than actually in the classroom. None of it is hard, but almost all of it is very time consuming.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: The BEST professor I have ever had. KSU is so lucky to have Dr. Frazier- and I have never enjoyed taking a course more. Dr. Frazier is very prompt with providing feedback that is thorough and constructive. She cares about each and every one of her students and this shows in the materials and resources she creates for each content module. Take her!!

Love Dr. Frazier! The course is a lot of work but she guides you throughout everything and tries to make everything stress free as possible. She is understanding, caring, and puts students' mental health first. I learned so much about technology in this course that I am able to implement all digital tools in the classroom for students!

Dr. Frazier is AMAZING! I can't put into words how great she is. She is the sweetest professor you'll ever have. She's always accessible through Remind101 & she is such an inspiration because you can tell she loves what she does and she loves her students. Please take her if you can. I'm going to miss her so much next semester!

Professor Frazier is the best. I once texted her a content-related question around 11pm on thanksgiving break, and she responded. She really cares and gives you opportunities to get better grades on things. TAKE HER!
